      • addPreffixToImgSrc

        public java.lang.String addPreffixToImgSrc(java.lang.String sPreffix)
                                    throws org.htmlparser.util.ParserException

        Add a preffix to <IMG SRC="..."> <TABLE BACKGROUND="..."> and <TD BACKGROUND="..."> tags

        Parameters:
        sPreffix - String preffix to be added to <img> src attribute and <table> and <td> background
        Returns:
        New HTML source with preffixed attributes
        Throws:
        org.htmlparser.util.ParserException

      • removePreffixFromImgSrcs

        public java.lang.String removePreffixFromImgSrcs(java.lang.String sPreffix)
                                          throws org.htmlparser.util.ParserException

        Remove a preffix from <IMG SRC="..."> <TABLE BACKGROUND="..."> and <TD BACKGROUND="..."> tags

        Parameters:
        sPreffix - String preffix to be removed from <img> src attribute and <table> and <td> background
        Returns:
        New HTML source with unpreffixed attributes
        Throws:
        org.htmlparser.util.ParserException

      • replacePreffixFromImgSrcs

        public java.lang.String replacePreffixFromImgSrcs(java.lang.String sFormerPreffix,
                                         java.lang.String sNewPreffix)
                                           throws org.htmlparser.util.ParserException

        Replace a preffix from <IMG SRC="..."> <TABLE BACKGROUND="..."> and <TD BACKGROUND="..."> tags with another one

        Parameters:
        sFormerPreffix - String
        sNewPreffix - String
        Returns:
        New HTML source with replaced preffixed attributes
        Throws:
        org.htmlparser.util.ParserException

                                           throws org.htmlparser.util.ParserException

        Replace HREF targets with an intermediate page for tracking click through

        Parameters:
        sRedirectorUrl - String Full HTTP path where all HREF URLs must be redirected
